1.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
1.author: - Carol Burnett

2.quote: Be courageous. Challenge orthodoxy. Stand up for what you believe in. When you are in your rocking chair talking to your grandchildren many years from now, be sure you have a good story to tell.
2.author: - Amal Clooney

3.quote: You make a choice: continue living your life feeling muddled in this abyss of self-misunderstanding, or you find your identity independent of it. You draw your own box.
3.author: - Duchess Meghan

4.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
4.author: - Winston Churchill

5.quote: You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
5.author: - Oprah Winfrey

6.quote: People tell you the world looks a certain way. Parents tell you how to think. Schools tell you how to think. TV. Religion. And then at a certain point, if you're lucky, you realize you can make up your own mind. Nobody sets the rules but you. You can design your own life.
6.author: Carrie Ann Moss

7.quote: Do not allow people to dim your shine because they are blinded. Tell them to put some sunglasses on.
7.author: - Lady Gaga

8.quote: You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens.
8.author: - Mady Hale

9.quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
9.author: - Ralph Waldo Emerson

10.quote: I'm going to be gone one day, and I have to accept that tomorrow isn't promised. Am I OK with how I'm living today? It's the only thing I can help. If I didn't have another one, what have I done with all my todays? Am I doing a good job?
10.author: - Hayley Williams

12.quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
12.author: - Robin Williams

13.quote: I care about decency and humanity and kindness. Kindness today is an act of rebellion.
13.author: - P!nk

14.quote: Don't try to lessen yourself for the world; let the world catch up to you.
14.author: - Beyoncé

15.quote: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one!
15.author: - Dolly Parton

16.quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear; knowing what must be done does away with fear.
16.author: - Rosa Parks

17.quote: Trying to grow up is hurting. You make mistakes. You try to learn from them, and when you don't, it hurts even more.
17.author: - Aretha Franklin

18.quote: Embrace the glorious mess that you are.
18.author: - Elizabeth Gilbert

19.quote: Being vulnerable is a strength, not a weakness.
19.author: - Selena Gomez

20.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
20.author: - George Eliot

21.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
21.author: - C.S. Lewis

22.quote: There's nothing more powerful than not giving a f—k.
22.author: - Amy Schumer

23.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
23.author: - Aristotle

24.quote: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
24.author: - Alexander the Great

25.quote: I'm not going to continue knocking that old door that doesn't open for me. I'm going to create my own door and walk through that.
25.author: - Ava DuVernay
